Title: Caldecott/Newbery Book Stand
Poster Text: The Newbery Medal; for the most distinguished contribution to American literature for children; The Caldecott Medal, for the most distinguished American picture book for children; These two medals awarded annually by the Children's Services Division of The American Library Association.
Description: Cardboard display stand for Caldecott and Newbery winner books. Blue and yellow. Photographed unfolded. When assembled each side has a small shelf to hold a book.
Subject: Caldecott Medal; Newbery Medal; Library Display; Children's Literature
Sponsor: American Library Association; Children's Book Council
